fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Select a player and a card type. Apply 1 phase of Cursed on them.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Select a player and a card type. Apply 3 phases of Cursed on them. 

*Stackable. Status takes effect **this** phase. Target will be notified that they were Cursed. Read <#1191650444594909354> for more information on player statuses.*
